name: Sarah Mitchell, CFP®
title: Certified Financial Planner • Retirement & Investing
bio: I help busy professionals build retirement plans and investment strategies they can stick to, with clear steps and regular check-ins.

name: David Park
title: Financial Advisor • Budgeting & Cash Flow
bio: I help clients get control of cash flow, build a realistic budget, and set up a simple system that works month after month.

name: Monica Reyes, EA
title: Enrolled Agent • Tax Planning Coordination
bio: I coordinate tax planning strategies with your CPA, help you avoid surprises, and align taxes with your investment and retirement goals.

name: Kevin Brooks
title: Advisor • Debt Payoff & Home Buying
bio: I help clients pay down debt strategically and prepare for major purchases like buying a home—without sacrificing long-term goals.

name: Aisha Khan
title: Insurance Planning Specialist
bio: I help families choose the right life and disability coverage, integrate it into their broader plan, and keep costs reasonable.

name: Thomas Greene
title: Education & College Planning Advisor
bio: I help parents plan for college costs, choose savings strategies, and balance education goals with retirement priorities.

name: Lena Novak
title: Estate Planning Coordination Advisor
bio: I help clients organize beneficiaries, coordinate estate planning with attorneys, and ensure plans stay aligned with family goals.

name: Marcus Chen
title: Business Owner Finances • Cash Flow & Tax Strategy
bio: I help business owners manage cash flow, plan for taxes, and structure savings so personal and business goals work together.
